ClientSpeedProvider Class Reference

The ClientSpeedProvider object provides control of the DirectionCursor that is non-linear, accelerates and has friction when near targets. More...

#include <client_camera.hpp>

Detailed Description

The ClientSpeedProvider object provides control of the DirectionCursor that is non-linear, accelerates and has friction when near targets.
